mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cart_id, c.user_id AS user_id, p.product_id As product_id, p.product_name AS product_name, c.cart_quantity, p.cart_price AS cart_price, (p.cart_price * c.cart_quantity) product_money, m.user_name AS user_name FROM tbl_cart c LEFT JOIN tbl_product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user m ON m.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.cart_id
SELECT NVL(SUM(cart_price * cart_quantity), 0) product_money FROM tbl_cart c LEFT JOIN tbl_product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id =#{user_id}
